rules_text:
Friendly Fir enters with two +1/+1 counters on it.
When Friendly Fir enters, create a 1/1 white Squirrel creature token with “When this creature deals combat damage to a player, muse 1.” [i](Choose a counter on another permanent you control or a card you own in in exile. Remove it or add another.)[/i]
notes:
3 MV Creature

BG Treefolk
GU Muse, 1/1 Squirrel token
